snippet.title: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled – PS4 Exclusives & CNK Content Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled is revving up with exclusive retro content for PS4 players: Retro skins for Crash, Coco, & Cortex, Retro karts, and a Retro track.  

Also announced, CTR Nitro-Fueled will include tracks, karts, arenas, and battle modes from Crash Nitro Kart - - in addition to all the content you remember from Crash Team Racing. 

With Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled, the stakes are high and the competition is fierce. It's the CTR you love, now kicked into the highest gear.

Available June 21, 2019.  Pre-order at the PlayStation Store.

Follow Crash!
Website: http://www.crashbandicoot.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/crashbandicoot
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/crashbandicoot
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/crashbandicoot
